sourcesContent: import NumberInput from '@Components/number-input' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Label, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' const NumberInputStates = () => { return ( Disabled & Readonly states Setting the prop disabled places the component in a disabled, non-interactive state. The{' '} readonly prop places the component in a readonly state (focusable, but the value cannot be changed by the user). ) } export default NumberInputStates
